listing.listing_description: Villa at Panorama is an intimate 2 bedroom home where you can discover the best of St. Lucia without ever leaving the property. Nestled high in the hills of the exclusive Cap Estate at the northernmost tip of the island, you’ll find peace and tranquility while surrounded by lush tropical foliage and sweeping views of the Caribbean Sea and countryside.Gorgeous dark, hardwood decks and latticework rails surround the villa. Start each morning by sipping an espresso on the rattan sofas of the outdoor lounge set. When the sun begins to reach its potential, step down onto the pool terrace and choose the chaise longue that looks most tempting. A plunge in the pool will cool you off and reinvigorate you for the afternoon. The al fresco dining area is the perfect place to take the spectacular sunsets visible from Villa at Panorama - a champagne cocktail would only make the experience more magical.Inside, whitewashed walls, wooden doors and furnishings, and colorful accents from a tropical spectrum give the home an authentic island feel. Air flows freely through the retractable wall found off the living room, where you can relax in imported English furniture and watch a movie on the flatscreen. A fully-equipped European kitchen is the perfect spot to create culinary memories for you and your guests and a lovely wooden dining table is ideal for gathering everyone together.Villa at Panorama’s 2 bedrooms are tastefully appointed with designer Egyptian cotton linens and stylish furnishings. Each room has a beautiful en-suite bathroom with tiled surfaces, elegant fixtures, modern walk-in shower and personal bathrobes. Queen size beds are found in both rooms as well as access to a private, furnished deck.When you’re ready to explore, there’s plenty to do. St. Lucia’s best golf course is a quick 5 minute drive away and Cap Estate has numerous sandy beaches spread about its 1,500 acres. Rodney Bay is just a 4 minute drive and there you’ll find upscale shopping and fine dining. Head down to the marina where you can rent a sailboat or organize excursions to the famous Pitons and Sulphur Springs.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

feature.p: Bedroom 1: Queen size bed, En-suite bathroom, Air conditioning
Bedroom 2: Queen size bed, En-suite bathroom, Air conditioning
At Extra Cost – advance notice may be required:

Note: The housekeepers are not trained nannies and should not be expected to look after and/or babysit infants and children. If you do make babysitting arrangements with the staff, please be advised this is at your own risk.

10 minute drive to restaurants, shops & grocery store

10 km drive to town and George F. L. Charles Airport (SLU)
66 km drive to Hewanorra International Airport (UVF)

feature.p: St. Lucia has an abundance of activities that your villa concierge can arrange for you. If you are feeling energetic, explore the Piton World Heritage Site and rainforest where you will find the Botanical Gardens, sulfur springs and beautiful waterfalls. If you enjoy being out on the sea then sailing down the wonderful St Lucian coast is not to be missed. Alternatively, relax and enjoy sundown out in Rodney Bay - you may even catch site of the dolphins or whales that dot the coastline.

listing.listing_address: Cap Estate, Gros Islet, Saint Lucia

listing.listing_description: Please note that the upstairs terrace will only be available Fall 2018. Please inquire with a Villa Specialist for more details.The moment you arrive in the villa’s stunning courtyard; you are in paradise. It’s a perfect stage for this stylish contemporary home with mesmerizing views. Lush gardens are filled with the fragrance of jasmine, colorful allemande and vivid bougainvillea anchored with magnificent palms. The covered walkway, as beautiful in daylight as in night time, is flanked on either side with small pools planted with tropical water foliage. Enter the double door and the panoramic view spreads before you like a dramatic mural. From the main terrace, the sweeping vistas stretch from La Samanna on Long Bay Beach westward to Plum Bay Beach; from the roof top lounge it is 360. The photogenic sunsets are simply spectacular.The layout takes full advantage of the villa’s visual assets. Deep covered loggias, supported by soft grey concrete columns, and sunning terraces flow around the house. Dining and lounging areas are strategically positioned to observe the view. The stunning infinity pool coils like a nautilus shell into an infinity jet tub.The interiors seamlessly connect with the exterior spaces. Floor to ceiling glass pocket doors open completely to the outside. The spacious open plan living and dining room, with unusual high vaulted ceilings, belongs in a design magazine. Sleek, elegant furnishings in grey, taupe, and cream are accented with pops of color. Vibrant modern art appears in every room adding visual interest. A modern gourmet kitchen opens to the view, connecting the chef with the guests.The three bedrooms are equal in size, spacious, and comfortable. Each room has private indoor and outdoor seating. The décor is clean and modern, schemed in taupe, grey and white each room with an individual color scheme. The spa bathrooms are stunning in tumbled travertine, Indonesian river rocks and sleek fixtures. Walk in showers flow into outdoor showers with sea views.Although very secluded, you are very close to amenities. Long Bay and Plum Bay beach are nearby. 10 minute drive brings you to the charming French capital of Marigot with restaurants, shops and galleries, historic buildings and the Creole Market. Drive 25 minutes to Grand Case; 30 to Philipsburg’s shopping haven and a mere 10 to the airport.

feature.p: Bedroom 1: King size bed, En-suite bathroom with stand-alone shower, Alfresco shower, Air conditioning, TV, DVD player, Fan
Bedroom 2: King size bed, En-suite bathroom with stand-alone shower, Alfresco shower, Air conditioning, TV, DVD player, Fan
Bedroom 3: King size bed, En-suite bathroom with stand-alone shower, Alfresco shower, Air conditioning, TV, DVD player, Fan

listing.listing_address: Terres Basses, Collectivity of Saint Martin, Saint Martin

listing.listing_description: Just below the crest of the mountain, off a dramatic drive, is Nid d’Amour. True to its French translation, Love Nest, the villa has been perfectly perched on the side of the hill to take full advantage of a truly spectacular view. Behind you are neighboring mountains; in front of you is the palm lined entrance to the villa. Enter the front door and a brilliant, variegated scene flows before you, painted in greens and blues. Within your scope are the tropical island mountains, Baie Rouge Beach and Marigot with its scenic marinas. To your left is Anguilla, so close you can touch it. The sightline stretches to Creole Rock in Grand Case and beyond to the Atlantic’s horizon. The sapphire sea, dotted with boats, is everywhere. Palms and sea grape and giant aloe frame the natural picture. It’s a perfect setting for a romantic tropical retreat.The villa takes full advantage of the mesmerizing vistas with large terraces filled with covered spaces for dining and lounging. The heated infinity pool with built in jetted tub, framed by columns, visually flows into the sea. Head up to the roof terrace for truly unobstructed 360 degree views and gorgeous sunsets.The interior’s tasteful sea inspired décor, in whites with touches of turquoise, compliments the view. The great room, with floor to ceiling glass doors, flows from the seating space into the charming French style kitchen which faces sea. Dine inside on the kitchen’s marble high top or in the splendid glass conservatory just off the kitchen; the view is the perfect backdrop for beautiful meals.The spacious bedrooms connect to the main house. Both face the sea and have semi-private outdoor seating spaces. The décor, in taupe and white with turquoise, blends with the vistas. Each en suite bathroom is spa like blending white cabinetry with natural stone and glass tiles. Large walk in showers have Indonesian river pebble floors and upscale fixtures. One shower opens to the view facing Anguilla.You are secluded yet close to amenities. It’s a short drive to Baie Rouge Beach. In 10 minute you reach the charming French capital of Marigot with restaurants, shops and galleries, historic buildings and the Creole Market. Drive 25 minutes to Grand Case and Philipsburg’s shopping haven. Only a short 10 minutes to access the international airport.

ul.li: Bedroom 1: King bed, En-suite bathroom with shower, Air-conditioning, Ceiling fans, Plasma TV, DVD player
Bedroom 2: King bed, En-suite bathroom with shower, Air-conditioning, Ceiling fans, Plasma TV, DVD player
One Arrival Transfer for up to 4 guests
10 minute drive to Marigot with restaurants and nightlife
10 minute drive to Princess Juliana International Airport (SXM)

listing.listing_description: _ CONSTRUCTION NOTE : Oil Nut Bay advises our guests that there is development activity occurring on property as additional villas are being constructed. Activity will vary depending on the time of year. Please inquire should you have any further questions. _Carved into the cliffside, the three individual deluxe one-bedroom rental suites that make up The Cliffs are perfect for a vacation getaway or temporary residence if you’re an Oil Nut Bay homeowner creating your legacy home. Designed with vision and environmental integrity, each suite enjoys unobstructed views of the azure Caribbean Sea. This development is so remote it can only be reached by boat!Everything has been designed to enhance the magnificent view, from the sliding glass doors and huge windows to the invisible balconies. Each suite boasts a large master bedroom, one and a half bathrooms and a luxurious great room. Private terraces and an inviting infinity edge plunge pool give you plenty of opportunity to top up your tan and you’re welcome to use all the Oil Nut Bay community amenities. The resort’s Beach Club boasts three pools, bars and restaurant and there’s a wellness center with fitness equipment and a yoga and Pilates room. Kids will especially love the programs and activities at the Nut House Kids’ Club and Nature Center. If work demands your attention, you can always use the onsite business center.Step into your suite’s tranquil great room and you’ll immediately feel relaxed. Drop your cares into the ocean and settle in a comfortable sofa as you admire the picture-postcard view. Soft sand colors lend a restful vibe to this cliffside paradise and if you ever tire of the panorama there are plenty of entertainment options, including Apple TV with sound system. The resort’s restaurants are so good you don’t need a kitchen, although there is a small service area with a wet bar, mini fridge, microwave and coffee maker for preparing snacks and drinks. If you need anything at all, just ask your concierge. The master suite gives top priority to your rest and relaxation. You don’t even have to get out of your king-size bed to appreciate the Caribbean Sea – just prop yourself up against the pillows and watch the boats drift past. The en-suite bathroom is just as luxurious, with an outdoor shower, double sinks and a deep standalone tub.With an electric golf cart at your disposal and great restaurants within walking distance, there’s no reason to stay at home. When you’re not swimming or lounging by one of the resort’s pools or enjoying light refreshments at the swim-up bar, take a yoga class or spa treatment or try a new watersport!Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.Please Note : Though there is no kitchen unit within the villa, the number of restaurants within the resort encourage you to kick back, bask in the comfortable luxury of this property, and allow someone else to do the cooking for you. Bon appetit!

feature.p: Bedroom 1 - Master: King size bed, En-suite bathroom with bathtub and alfresco shower, Great room, Wet bar, Mini fridge, Direct access to private terrace and plunge pool

listing.listing_description: Wild Orchid’s name foreshadows the natural splendor you’ll discover at this grand, St. Lucia villa. Located in the hills of the exclusive Cap Estate at the northernmost tip of the island, this unique home, surrounded by lush green palms, bright bougainvillea and mature gardens, offers an inspired panoramic view of the Caribbean Sea and Atlantic.Flower-trimmed trellises skirt the wide, tiled terrace where you can take your pick of cushioned sunbathing chairs. A dip in the immense pool will cool you down again. Grill fresh seafood on the outdoor barbecue and enjoy it at a round table on the terrace. A few steps up, on the veranda, an 8 person dining table is the perfect for dinner al fresco.Lofty French doors and windows allow St. Lucia’s famous trade winds to circulate freely inside. A bright, tropical color palette of turquoise, fuchsia, yellow and green is daubed liberally on furnishings and decor throughout the villa. The cozy living room opens on 3 sides under vaulted ceilings of local wood. A second living area is found on the veranda and a modern, fully-equipped kitchen is the perfect place to create memorable meals.10 guests can sleep comfortably at Wild Orchid. Each of the 5 bedrooms is decorated with charming island fabrics and include air conditioning. The master bedroom occupies the entire second floor and features 2 private decks with views of both land and water. 2 other bedrooms are located on the first floor, each with its own en-suite bathroom. A separate apartment houses the last 2 rooms with a shared double-sink bathroom.When you’re ready to explore, Cap Estate’s privacy quickly gives way to the hub of St. Lucia’s social and cultural life: Rodney Bay. It’s just a 10 minute drive to Gros Islet where you can shop, dine or just watch the boats go in and out of the marina. Nearby Pigeon Island is a great place to lay on the beach or do a little snorkeling. The estate is also home to an 18-hole golf course.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Azure, cerulean, teal, sapphire—see all the shades of blue from the veranda of this classic Caribbean home in the lush hills of St. Martin’s quiet Mont Choisy area. The only thing interrupting the vistas of sea, sky, and pool is a sun-kissed terrace stocked with loungers and studded with the occasional palm tree. More palm trees ring intimate Happy Bay Beach, a 10-minute walk downhill.You’ll be welcomed to this vacation rental by a transfer, breakfast basket, and the sea stretching to the horizon over a swimming pool, plunge pool, and hot tub on the terrace. Work up a sweat in the well-equipped gym and infrared sauna, pour a glass from the wine cooler for refreshment, and share photos of your holiday over Wi-Fi.Glass walls and a pass-through invite the views and the breeze inside the house. The wood-paneled veranda roof soars up to a vaulted ceiling over the living area and a fully equipped kitchen with good-enough-to-eat cherry-red cabinets in a high gloss. Just through the kitchen is a dining area that’s walled on one side, open to the vistas on the other.This luxury property has three bedrooms with king beds, two of which have their own private entrances, and one bedroom with two twin beds that can be connected to the master king bedroom for a family traveling with younger children. All four bedrooms have en-suite bathrooms.Drive 5 minutes into Grand Case to shop or pick up takeout, then tote a picnic on the 10-minute walk to Happy Bay Beach, whose clothing-optional shores are perfect for couples wanting to relive their honeymoon, and Friars Bay Beach, a kid-friendly spot that also has a beach bar. It’s also 15 minutes or less to shopping and dining along Orient Bay Beach and in Marigot, the capital of the French side of the island.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Make your mark on famed Grace Bay Beach at Footprints on the Beach. Set on the exclusive Tranquility Lane on the beach’s eastern end, the six-bedroom villa has extensive outdoor spaces and 100 feet of oceanfront on Grace Bay Beach.The villa is surrounded by an acre of landscaped grounds, and opens to a backyard with pool, terrace, fire pit and beach. Spend the day using the snorkel and swimming, playing on the outdoor pool table or ping pong table, relaxing on the beach chairs or hammock, then rinse off in one of the two outdoor showers. You will enjoy the services of your very own private chef creating delicious delicacies from his extensive repertoire. Any three daily meals prepared for you (groceries extra) or be catered by the on-staff butler. Gather around the fire pit to watch the stars or, if it’s a warm evening, retreat inside to the central air conditioning and satellite television.Footprints has recently undergone a change in ownership and just completed (Nov 2018) a multimillion-dollar renovation to both the interior and exterior. The villa has been professionally decorated with all new contemporary furnishings, a new kitchen and a chef kitchen with an open design on the main floor.Each of the villa’s six bedrooms has a full en-suite bathroom, air conditioning, satellite television, ceiling fan and is stocked with bathrobes and toiletries. There are five bedrooms with king beds (one wheelchair accessible bedroom), and one bedroom with two bunk beds (4 beds). There are two high chairs and two cribs available for the youngest guests.Though Footprints on the Beach is tucked away from the bustle of the island’s resort area, it’s just 3.2 km by car to the golf course, and 4.8 km to grocery stores, a tennis court, the Salt Mills shopping area and downtown. Have dinner and drinks at the restaurants and bars along the busier areas of Grace Bay, then enjoy a quiet evening back on your own private stretch of sand.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.Read more about Footprints on the Beach in our magazine (http://magazine.luxuryretreats.com/2014/07/beachfront-villa-on-turks-and-caicos/)

listing.listing_description: Villa Sardinia is a stunning, one-bedroom beachfront villa on the island of Providenciales, in Turks and Caicos. Situated directly on the white sands of Taylor Bay Beach, as part of a private, three-villa complex, your vacation rental features one beautiful bedroom suite, lovely indoor and outdoor living areas, and spectacular views of the Caribbean Sea, creating the ideal setting in this island paradise for honeymoons and romantic escapes.Savor dreamy days in the Caribbean sun, plunging into the turquoise waters and strolling your secluded stretch of beach, before returning to your private terrace to bathe in the lagoon-like swimming pool. Relax on elegant loungers while sipping champagne and gazing on the spectacular ocean view. Then join each other at the alfresco table in the covered veranda for a delicious barbeque meal. Lovely lighting invites you to breathe the ocean air deep into the night.Wide glass doors open from the terrace into the villa's living room, inviting ocean views and breezes inside. The bright and lovely lounge is ideal for watching movies and enjoying cocktails together, while the luminous, fully equipped kitchen with breakfast bar sets the stage for inspired mixology and sumptuous feasts. The understated but exquisite design and décor, including superb artwork and tasteful touches of vibrant, sea-inspired color, echo the stunning natural beauty of this heavenly island.The villa's bedroom, located on the upper floor, is the ideal space for sumptuous relaxation. A king bed looks out on expansive ocean views. Wide glass doors open to the furnished balcony overlooking the pool, where you'll enjoy morning coffee and evening cocktails. The ensuite bathroom, joined to the bedroom by an open wall gazing out on the ocean, features a stand-alone tub and stand-alone shower.Villa Sardinia offers the perfect combination of seclusion and convenience. In addition to the stretch of Turtle Bay Beach, the three-villa complex has a private tennis court. Beyond the villas, downtown Providenciales, with its shops and restaurants, is about seven kilometers away, as is Providenciales National Airport. Provo Golf and Country Club, boasting one of the finest courses in the Caribbean, is an easy drive. The precious natural beauty of Princess Alexandra National Park is about twelve kilometers away.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

ul.li: Bedroom 1 - Master: King size bed, Ensuite bathroom with stand-alone shower, Dual Vanity, Toiletries, Walk-in Closet, Safe, Ceiling fan, Private balcony, Outdoor furniture, Ocean View,

listing.listing_description: Like its namesake, Black Pearl is a gorgeous and unique property that can accommodate both family vacations and couple’s getaways with ease. The brand-new four-bedroom villa is set on a hillside near Marigot Bay and has unforgettable views of the Grand Cul de Sac lagoon and the ocean beyond. Spend your stay basking in the Caribbean sunshine by the private pool or exploring the nearby beaches.Though the villa’s living spaces are comfortably air-conditioned, you’ll want to step outside to the terrace, which has covered sitting and dining areas and a sunny lounge area around the heated infinity pool. A gas barbecue makes it easy to try local specialties. After a day at the beach, turn on the satellite television and sound system or post your pictures via Wi-Fi.The interiors of Black Pearl have cool, contemporary lines that keep the focus on the gorgeous ocean views. The sleek great room is almost entirely white, save its pale wood floors and a playful orange cabinet, creating a clean, fresh feel. A long white sectional is a welcoming spot in the sitting area, and minimalist flat-fronted cabinets conceal everything you’ll need in the fully equipped kitchen.All four bedrooms at Black Pearl have queen beds, en-suite bathrooms and air conditioning; for added privacy, there are two on the main floor and two on the lower level. The two bedrooms on the main floor have satellite television and ocean views, and one of the bedrooms on the lower level has satellite television as well. Like the common areas, the bedrooms have white walls and bedding and clean-lined furniture for a restful, minimalist vibe.Thanks to the villa’s location near Marigot Bay, it’s easy to try out beaches until you find the perfect one. It’s just under 600 meters to Marigot Beach, a 5-minute drive to Lorient Beach, 2.9 km to Petit Cul de Sac Beach, just over 4.4 km to Nikki Beach, 5 km to St Jean Beach and Saline Beach and 8.5 km to Gouverneur Beach. In the evenings, head to Gustavia, a 6.5 km drive away, for shopping and dining, and when it’s time to leave, Gustaf III Airport is a 4.2 km drive from the villa.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Overlooking Darkwood beach, this incredibly beautiful two-bedroom is the perfect destination for a family beach getaway or a romantic island honeymoon. On the southern coast of Antigua’s Jolly Harbour, the Tamarind Hills resort enjoys an amazing location between two of the island’s best beaches, as well as quick and easy access to golf, fine dining, beachfront bars, and the shops of Jolly Harbour.This sleek and stylish villa features a classic color scheme, decorated with pure whites, deep wood tones, and exciting tropical accents. Both bedrooms, and the open concept living area, feature wide openings to the terrace, and breathtaking ocean view. Inside, you’ll love the villa’s state of the art tech features, designer furnishings, and top of the line appliances. Outside, the balconies are decorated with sun loungers, sitting and dining areas, and the refreshing infinity pool.This Tamarind Hills suite comes with a fully equipped kitchen, formal and alfresco dining, a coffee machine, dishwasher, and barbecue. To keep you connected, the villa is outfitted with Wi-Fi and cable television. And, the entire apartment is air-conditioned. During your stay, you’ll have twenty-four-hour security, parking, and housekeeping, every other day.Whether you’re in the mood for freshly caught lobster and cocktails on the beachfront or an elegant dining experience in one of the island’s best restaurants, you’ll find what you’re looking for within a few minutes of Tamarind Hills. For a laid-back evening watching the sunset from a beachfront bar, head to Dennis’s Bar or Jackie O’s, both just five minutes from home. For a special night of fine dining, Sheer Rocks is the spot, also just fine minutes away. If you’d like to visit some of Antigua’s historic sites, check out the English Harbour, where you’ll discover the island’s colonial past. And, if there’s a golfer in the group, Cedar Valley and Jolly Harbour golf clubs are both just five minutes from Tamarind Hills.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.
